Bipartisan border, Ukraine deal looks set to fail in US SenateA bipartisan $118 billion U.S. Senate bill to tighten border security and provide aid to allies Ukraine and Israel appeared headed to the scrap heap on Wednesday, after Republicans egged on by Donald Trump turned against the idea. Wed, 07 Feb 2024 11:08:18 GMT SJVX2ED25ZN3NP5ZQEJNBD3SJY https://www.reuters.com/world/us/bipartisan-border-ukraine-deal-looks-set-fail-us-senate-2024-02-07/Richard Cowan世界美国
Eagle Pass tires of spotlight as Texas immigration fight intensifiesMain Street in downtown Eagle Pass, Texas, is quiet as Laurel Cadena pushes a stroller with her 3-week-old daughter nestled inside, a stark contrast from hours before when dueling protests over U.S.-Mexico border policy filled the air with shouts and chants. Wed, 07 Feb 2024 11:05:57 GMT GLJJLDKGBBRLV7OP5MJ2ABRBJDQ https://www.reuters.com/world/us/eagle-pass-tires-spotlight-texas-immigration-fight-intensizes-2024-02-07/Ted Hesson世界美国
EU: conditions to complete Mercosur trade deal not met yetThe conditions that would allow the EU to conclude a trade agreement with the Mercosur group of South American countries have not been met, European Commission Executive Vice President Maros Sefcovic said on Wednesday, although talks continue. Wed, 07 Feb 2024 11:01:10 GMT FF3EZXZIFJJ7RIXP5P3TWKFD5E https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/eu-conditions-complete-mercosur-trade-deal-not-met-yet-2024-02-07/Kate Abnett世界欧洲
Teenage 'Newton of Gaza' creates system to light up family tentUsing two fans he picked up from a scrap market and rigged to some wires, teenager Hussam Al-Attar has created his own source of electricity to light up the tent where he and his family are living after being displaced by Israel's assault on Gaza. Wed, 07 Feb 2024 10:48:44 GMT V6MMQFIG4ZJEVBONMCJ4Q5OAYQ https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/teenage-newton-gaza-creates-system-light-up-family-tent-2024-02-07/Saleh Salem, Ibraheem Abu Mustafa世界中东
Kremlin says focus of Nord Stream probe is now on Germany after Sweden drops outKremlin spokesman Dmitry Peskov said on Wednesday that Russia will watch what Germany does to investigate explosions which tore through the Nord Stream gas pipelines in 2022 after Sweden dropped its own investigation. Wed, 07 Feb 2024 10:46:05 GMT G3ATXFZWINMXXI4RGBRL2VAR7Q https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/kremlin-says-focus-nord-stream-probe-is-now-germany-after-sweden-drops-out-2024-02-07/Reuters世界欧洲
Polish opposition politicians scuffle with parliament security in spat over statusTwo Polish opposition politicians mired in a row over whether they can still sit in parliament after criminal convictions tussled with security outside the assembly on Wednesday as they tried to force their way in. Wed, 07 Feb 2024 10:35:49 GMT ZIACWEF5TBJJJMLKZFI4H3XGIQ https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/polish-opposition-politicians-scuffle-with-parliament-security-spat-over-status-2024-02-07/Reuters世界欧洲
Putin gave Tucker Carlson an interview because he differs from one-sided media - KremlinRussian President Vladimir Putin granted an interview to U.S. television host Tucker Carlson on Tuesday because his approach differs from the one-sided reporting of many traditional Western news media, the Kremlin said. Wed, 07 Feb 2024 10:32:36 GMT OSWPWTWQKNJAVCYPX6D2OEINUE https://www.reuters.com/world/putin-gave-tucker-carlson-an-interview-because-he-differs-one-side-media-2024-02-07/Reuters世界
Zimbabwe cabinet scraps colonial-era death penalty lawZimbabwe's cabinet on Tuesday agreed to abolish the death penalty following months of debate in parliament, choosing instead to impose lengthy prison sentences for the worst offences. Wed, 07 Feb 2024 10:22:44 GMT VWVY4FNF6BNM7A2T4WWZDGAFXE https://www.reuters.com/world/africa/zimbabwe-cabinet-scraps-colonial-era-death-penalty-law-2024-02-07/Reuters世界非洲
UN says war-torn Sudan must not be forgotten, calls for aid fundingThe United Nations on Wednesday urged countries not to forget the civilians caught up in the war in Sudan, appealing for $4.1 billion to meet their humanitarian needs, as well as support those who have fled to neighbouring countries. Wed, 07 Feb 2024 09:38:13 GMT NG2NLH63ZNODFIKBUMTCWXD5WY https://www.reuters.com/world/africa/un-appeals-41-bln-help-war-torn-sudan-refugees-2024-02-07/Gabrielle Tétrault-Farber世界非洲
Azerbaijan votes in snap presidential poll after Karabakh victory, crackdown on dissentAzerbaijan's President Ilham Aliyev is almost certain be re-elected on Wednesday in a vote he called early after the recapture of the breakaway region of Nagorno-Karabakh from Armenia and a crackdown on the media. Wed, 07 Feb 2024 09:28:06 GMT EO4CYVCPKJK3PINMBTTOGYX2WA https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/azerbaijan-votes-snap-presidential-poll-after-karabakh-victory-crackdown-dissent-2024-02-07/Reuters世界欧洲
Sweden ends Nord Stream sabotage probe, hands evidence to GermanySwedish prosecutors said on Wednesday they would drop their investigation into explosions on the Nord Stream 1 and 2 gas pipelines and hand evidence uncovered in the probe over to German investigators. Wed, 07 Feb 2024 09:09:52 GMT 2THWNHB4PRJWPNMHEGCBYTW4PM https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/sweden-ends-investigation-into-nord-stream-pipeline-blasts-2024-02-07/Reuters世界欧洲
